name: Lotus Public Relations
description: PR for technology and startup companies
overview:
Founded in 2002, Lotus Public Relations helps evolving companies in fast moving industries by using PR strategies to drive sales and revenue.

Clients seek out Lotus to enhance their position among competitors, stake out new markets and accelerate customer acquisition and loyalty. By working hand-in-hand with sales, marketing and executive teams, Lotus takes PR into the realm of revenue generation through creative PR and marketing strategies that inspire the media and move the marketplace.

We specialize in PR for technology, gaming, financial services, venture capital, travel and new media sectors. We’re different from other PR firms in that we focus on driving sales and revenue for our clients, rather than “hype” and buzz. Check us out at www.lotus-pr.com

Public Relations Industry Expertise: Technology Venture Capital Social Media Media Online Gaming Poker / Poker Tournaments Graphic Arts Financial Services

Specialties: Sales & Marketing Public Relations Strategy and Planning Social Media Media Relations Event Planning Trade Shows Business Development

Awards: Winner 2009 Bulldog Reporter Award: Best Branding and Positioning Finalist: Stevie Awards 2009 Communications Campaign of the Year
